home-header-text: Hello, I'm Teresa - a front-end developer from Europe who loves crafting user-friendly websites and applications. I create websites primarily in Vue 3 and WordPress but also learn NodeJS and Docker for full-stack development. I also have some basic skills using Figma for UI/UX design.
about-text: Hi there! I'm a dedicated Frontend Developer with two years of experience in the field.

posts.description: From September 2020 to August 2022, I studied Computer Science, at Palacky University in Olomouc.

Following my studies, I joined Total Avengers, where I honed my skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. During my time there, I worked on several notable projects, including Invest in Slovakia, Parkio, Clerk, UI Builder, and various smaller websites.

Since January of this year, I've been working at GIS Services, specializing in geoinformation systems. Here, I utilize Angular and TypeScript, and work extensively with databases, primarily PostgreSQL.

In addition, since May, I've been employed at 3RMarketing, balancing two jobs simultaneously. At 3RMarketing, I create simple websites using WordPress and have also gained foundational knowledge in SEO.
